Hey dideck1! Can you please provide intructions in english.

I got this installed and found the patch and installed that too. What am I supposed to do next to get it in enghlish and actually play the game?

to all noobs dont take that offensively lol because i was a noob and so was everyone else on the internet... if you dont know how to do this then keep reading... all you do.. use daemon tools to mount the iso image that you download from this site.. to the drive... install game.. then from there... go to like.. game copy world dot com or something simaler... search for a no cd patch... and then replace the exe or dll file depending on what kind of file it gives you to download... if any concerns email me at pirate1018239@live.com and i'll send a more detail description that or i'll just make a tut on youtube.. its a bit complicating i know... i still get confused sometimes... and the process is sometimes endless because you gotta find the patch and sometimes game copy world may not have it so you can also search through all the torrent sites to find one sometimes the search may seem endless believe me.. i have maybe 2 games that im still looking for a functional no cd patch... that ive been searching for probably for about 3months now.. this isn't rocket sience no but on the other hand i admit its not the easiest of all things either.. sometimes can be complicating.. anyways... message me or email.. if need help i'll give detailed description... just lemme know a game your trying to get to work.. and i myself will get that game.. if i dont have it even.. and install it myself to get a better description for you and so on..
